bwwExcerpt: "Beetlejuice at the Van Wezel Performing Arts Center was a dazzling spectacle of comedy, music, and stellar performances that left a lasting impression. The show skillfully captured the essence of the legendary film while translating it into a unique and engaging theatrical experience. With standout performances by Justin Collette and Madison Mosley, combined with impeccable comedic timing, striking visuals, and a talented ensemble that thrived on stage, this musical was a perfect blend of humor
